casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joan Myrtle SHANNON. No. 177A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2007. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. W. Clark Everett, District Attorney, for Conference of District Attorneys. Joseph B. Cheshire, V, Bradley J. Bannon, for NCATL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Shannon) shall have up to and including the 5th day of September 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2007."
